attributes.action: A focused with powers of arrest, inquiry for theses grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: Because the government are supposed to protect the citizens of it's country, and not allow the type of pervers crime of what has been going on for years!
attributes.background: Arrest everyone involved in what has been going on across the country, deport any humans that are part of these gangs that are not British born and the ones that are put in UK prisons, also any politicians, police,social services, that are found to have covered this up, prison also.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action: 

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976 

Deport people with dual nationality who are found guilty of raping children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714124

Establish a reparations scheme for victims of Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712441

Set up an independent task force separate from police to target grooming gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713221
